title: Unfair updates
body: Personally i think the pre season update is quite stupid for marksmen/adc most of the champions attack damage was buffed to almost 60 base attack damage but miss fortunes was actually nerfed from 49.54 down to bloody 46 and the attack damage gained on level was nerfed from 3 down to 1 which means she gets 64 bloody base attack damage at 18 i think this is quite stupid and needs to be fixed

replies.body:
Her passive makes up for it though. She does 50-100% AD bonus damage. So even base, her 1st auto will do roughly 74 damage.

Granted if you can't proc her passive she loses damage, but if you can constantly switch targets, say, minion, champion, minion, champion. Thats a lot of extra damage. Plus the Q bonus damage and prioritising marked targets.

Changed her play style from an extended trade winner to a poker (instead of being both). Especially with the W change.
So you would rather get the bonus damage by swapping from target to target rather than just forgo the bonus and constantly put more damage on the same target? Sure, why not.
i didn't say i'd rather it, but it is a "unique playstyle". If you want that playstyle, play Caitlyn
personally Miss fortune is one of the best Markspeople in the game now

She is strong enough to where she doesn't need that extra damage now, base stats are not the thing that give a  champions strength, what would unfair is if riot gave 1 champ way more power than any others
